content: both needle 1 knit all stitches needles needle 2 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches round 2 knit before the end of row k2tog k1 continue these two rounds until you round 2 have reached 10 12 12 stitches left on knit all stitches each needle graft together using the kitchener stitch and weave in all ends block as desired repeat these two rounds until you ve reached your original stitch count 56 64 72 continue in stockinette for needle 1 and pattern for needle 2 until your work measures 1 25 1 5 1 75 / 3 81 4 4 cm shorter than your total foot length or desired negative ease 4 @twinstitchesdesigns 2020 all rights reserved chart pattern this chart is worked bottom up starting at row 1 and read from right to left small chart a cuff small chart b leg/foot option a written instructions round 1 k2 p2 x 3 k16 round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 k2 p2 1/1 lc x 2 p18 small chart b leg/foot option b written instructions round 1 k2 p2 x 7 round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 k2 p2 1/1 lc x 2 p18 5 @twinstitchesdesigns 2020 all rights reserved medium chart a cuff medium chart b leg/foot option a written instructions round 1 k2 p2 x 3 k20 round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 k2 p2 1/1 lc x 2 p22 medium chart b leg/foot option b written instructions round 1 k2 p2 x 8 round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 k2 p2 1/1 lc x 2 p22 6 @twinstitchesdesigns 2020 all rights reserved large chart a cuff large chart b leg/foot option a written instructions round 1 k2 p2 x 3 k24 round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 k2 p2 1/1 lc x 2 p26 large chart b leg/foot option b written instructions round 1 k2 p2 x 9 round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 k2 p2 1/1 lc x 2 p26 7 @twinstitchesdesigns 2020 all rights reserved abbreviations 1/1 lc slip 1 stitch onto a cable needle and hold in front k1 then k1 from cable needle bor beginning of round co cast on k knit k2tog knit two stitches together p purl sl slip_stitch ssk slip the next two stitches one at a time as if to knit insert the left hand needle through the front of these stitches and knit them together through their back loops thank you for purchasing my pattern you can find me on ravelry and ig @ julieannknitter use #togetherweknitsocks #twinstitchesdesigns to share your creations email twinstitchesdesigns3@gmail com for any questions 8 @twinstitchesdesigns 2020 all rights reserved
